data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: Dear sirWe hereby submit herewith the order received from AO, SEBI dated 12th November 2024 against the company and its directors. order enclosed.

data.caption: Clarification sough from LCC Infotech Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from LCC Infotech Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://www.cnbctv18.com dated November 12, 2024 (Link: https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/sebi-fines-lcc-infotech-promoters-for-misrepresenting-financial-statements-19508516.htm) titled SEBI fines LCC Infotech, promoters for misrepresenting financial statements.

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, this is to inform you that the
Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, August 12th 2021, has, inter alia,
considered and approved:
The Standalone Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30,
2021. A copy of the Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the quarter ended on June
30, 2021 along with the Limited Review report thereon are enclosed herewith.
2. The Consolidated Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30,
2021. A copy of the same for the quarter ended on June 30, 2021 along with the consolidated
Limited Review report thereon are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Submission Of Financial Result For Qtr And Year Ended On 31.03.2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, we enclosed and forward herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Audited financial result of the company for the Qtr. and Year ended on 31.03.2021 which has been approved and taken on record at the board meeting held on 30.06.2021 along with Independent Auditor report and declaration of unmodified opinion on Auditor Report.
The meeting commenced at 2 PM and concluded at 4 PM
